text: the game between Serbia and Albania was
always going to be a grudge match
relations between the two countries have
been tense since Serbia's majority
ethnic Albanian province Kosovo
unilaterally declared independence six
years ago for that reason Albanian fans
were banned from the stadium for their
own safety minutes before half-time
a drone soared over the stadium carrying
a flag emblazoned with a black eagle
which is the symbol for greater Albania
Serbia Stefan Mitrovic grabbed it and
brought it down infuriated some albanian
players stepped in to take it back and
minutes later Serbian fans invaded the
pitch and riot police had to be brought
in to restore calm the match was
abandoned now it's up to you a fir to
decide what action to take
I cannot command on who's to blame or
what to blame or what happens I'll
report that together with my colleagues
and bring it to wafer and a wafer we'll
decide on what will happen further
Serbia's captain said his team wanted to
play on what albania didn't all of the
night was the age those on us what's
important is that we as a team wanted to
continue the game but after talks with
UEFA the albanian team said that they
were not physically and mentally able to
play the game
